page.title: 15Brownie Pack
page.content:
Every Monday after school we get dressed in the{Brownie uniform,}brown dress, belt, hat and a yellow tie.
Tibberton Brownies were started{l5 {years ago.}Brownies are girls between 7 and ll years old joining together to do good turns, work for badges, and have fun. Some interesting games we play are called Ladders, Stations and Supermarket.
We work for{badges}either alone or with the pack. One badge is Rambler. For this badge you have to go on four long walks and pick flowers by the way.
The pack is split into groups called{Sixes.} All Brownies have to keep the{Brownie promise.
